gettingStarted: Open the site and use the search box to perform queries
Sign in with a Google account to access personalized features (Gmail, Drive, Maps, YouTube)
Use the apps menu to access services like News, Maps, and Drive
mainFeatures: Search results with featured snippets and knowledge panels
Integrated services: Gmail, Drive, Maps, YouTube, Photos, Calendar
Local results, maps, and business listings
bestPractices: Use clear, concise search queries to get relevant results
Sign in to synchronize preferences across devices
Enable two-factor authentication for account security
Use filters (News, Images, Videos, Maps) to refine results
Review privacy settings for personalized content control
google.targetAudience: General public searching for information, businesses managing local listings, and developers using Google APIs
useCases: Accessing email via Gmail and files via Drive
Using Maps for directions and local business info
Watching and sharing videos on YouTube

gettingStarted: Browse the site for trending videos or search for specific channels/content
Sign in to subscribe to channels and save playlists
Use recommended feed and explore categories for discovery
bestPractices: Use descriptive search terms and filters (Upload date, Type, Duration)
Subscribe and enable notifications for channels you follow
useCases: Consume video content for education and entertainment
Publish videos and grow an audience

gettingStarted: Search products on the site and use filters to narrow results
Create an account to purchase, review, and track orders
Use wishlists and saved items for later purchase
mainFeatures: Product listings with ratings and reviews
Order management, shipping, and return flows
bestPractices: Read product reviews and check seller ratings
Use filters and sort by price or review score
Monitor deals and apply coupons when available

gettingStarted: Browse repositories or search by topic
Sign in to star repositories, fork, and contribute via pull requests
Use Issues and Discussions to engage with projects
mainFeatures: Source code hosting and version control
bestPractices: Follow contribution guidelines before submitting pull requests
Use descriptive commit messages and PR descriptions
Protect main branches with required reviews

gettingStarted: Use language selector for localized content
Review references and external links for primary sources
bestPractices: Use the revision history to view changes
